newsitem.title: FRANCE: France's Gen des Eaux to sell unit to UK's Cinven.
newsitem.headline: France's Gen des Eaux to sell unit to UK's Cinven.

text.p: French conglomerate Generale des Eaux said on Tuesday that it was holding exclusive talks with British fund management firm Cinven Ltd on the sale of its health activities.
It said in a statement that, if the parties reached an agreement, a sale could take place before the end of June.
Generale des Eaux's health business comprises Cie Generale de Sante in France and Generale de Sante International Plc in Britain.

The French group said on April 3 that it was planning to sell the business for around 8.5 billion francs, generating a 1.2 billion franc capital gain. It said at the time that it was considering two offers, one from Cinven and another from BC Partners, also a fund manager.
